participant_1.name: Evelyn Harper
participant_1.personality: Evelyn is a romantic at heart, with a deep appreciation for the beauty of life. She's adventurous and enjoys sharing stories from her long life.
participant_1.background: i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i'm 100 years old. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Jake is laid-back and friendly, often cracking jokes and making others feel at ease. He has a passion for music and enjoys connecting with people.
participant_2.background: i am a convenience store manager. i've short brown hair. i drive a nissan pathfinder. my favourite music is country music. i met taylor swift.

content.text: Whazzup? i like to go to the movies and dance in the fall
